name: Isaac Ramirez
tagline: Innovating technological solutions for a connected future

details.value: Fullstack Developer with expertise in migrating monolithic applications to microservices, cloud implementation (Azure), and developing customer experience solutions. Experienced in leading technical teams and applying AI/ML, IoT, and Big Data in industrial contexts

extra_insights.title: Problem-Solving Approach
extra_insights.description: My approach to problem-solving is characterized by adaptability and a 'never stop learning' mindset. I am not afraid to step out of my comfort zone to tackle challenges, as demonstrated when I moved from programming to the physical installation of network infrastructure and cameras in my first job. In my second job, hired for implementation, I quickly mastered the development of self-service kiosks, perfecting existing practices and achieving adaptability across various screens, which allowed me to lead projects with major brands. This ability to learn on the fly, as with SOA architecture, is fundamental to my methodology, always seeking effective and tangible solutions.

extra_insights.title: Impact of My Work
extra_insights.description: I strive for my work to have a positive and measurable impact. In my roles, I have directly contributed to: increasing team productivity by optimizing processes; accelerating software delivery through improvements in development cycles; driving the growth of development capabilities within the company; improving client perception through robust and efficient solutions, which led key clients to specifically request my assistance (ACF, Datum); and simplifying internal communication by becoming the preferred technical point of contact for employees for support in my roles.

extra_insights.title: Values and Work Style
extra_insights.description: My work ethic is deeply rooted in my values of honesty, kindness, responsibility, and commitment. I approach each project with great care, especially when handling sensitive client data. My previous experience in construction has given me a unique perspective on problem-solving and practical creativity in development. My faith in God inspires me to use my skills to help others through technology, always seeking to build solutions that not only work but also serve a greater purpose.
